what_we_do.title: What We <span className='g_secondary'>Do
what_we_do.description: Growth-X is a digital ecosystem fostering under its parent company Prism IT Systems https://www.prismitsystems.com/ . Prism IT systems is a web-development company based in Surat, Gujarat; working on a full-throttle since 2009.
what_we_do.service_title: Growth-X offers a comprehensive array of Digital Marketing services like:
service_steps: Branding of small to big businesses
what_we_do.othor_services: Besides, Growth-X also offers digital services like designing brochures, logos, brand artworks, product artworks, and marketing banners of all types of businesses.

business_section.title:
Make Your Business More
Competitive and Sustainable
list: Digital Marketing contributes about 150 billion US dollars to the global economy. The Digital Marketing market size valued at 305 billion USD in 2020, shall escalate up-to 807 billion USD till 2026, with a growing CAGR of 17.6%. Companies tend to spend billions of dollars on Social Media Advertising annually.

Globally, about 3.96 billion people use social media; where India show-cases about 376 million social media users. The global e-commerce retail rate peaked up-to 4.28 trillion USD in the year 2020; with more than 2 billion digital purchases of goods & services from all over the world.

The average e-commerce expenditure per person, per visit was noted to be 3 USD in the year 2020, with customer conversion rate of 2.17%. With 1.7 billion websites registered by the year 2020, the online marketing is gaining traction.

Growth-X visions that every business, despite of its size, must acquire a brand value. Let’s partner our skill sets; you give us ideas, and we as per our promise, shall transform your ideas into a colorful spectrum of business insights, taking your company at new heights of success and popularity.

services.title: Our Featured Services
services.description: Growth-X is your digital partner, and together we can explore all the facets of digital marketing, outranking the competitors in the competitive edge marketing. Growth-X offers a wide range of Digital Marketing services like:

service_list1.title: Google Analytics
service_list1.description: Growth-X is a digital partner of Google, and our marketing professionals are Google Analytics Certified. We build new Google Analytics Account, or set-up an already existing account; thereby analyzing all the aspects of business metrics.

service_list1.title: Social Media Analytics
service_list1.description: We utilize Social Media Analytics to gather, measure, and standardize the data from various social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, and others; with an objective to make business decisions and quantify company’s growth

service_list1.title: SEO Marketing
service_list1.description: We know SEO! Growth-X acquires an asset of exceptionally tech-savvy professionals who are pro at SEO. We optimize your website and webpages in such a manner, that it can fetch more organic traffic from various search engines.

service_list2.title: Content Creating
service_list2.description: Content is the heart of any website, blog, or web-page. Be it entertainment, commercial, corporate, educational, or name any other industry that exists; the only way to attract new customers and generate good leads is through the power of words.

service_list2.title: Social Media Marketing
service_list2.description: With the evolution of digital era the use of social media marketing has gained momentum. It escalates the revenue of any business, be it small or big. Strong presence on social media is the only way to reinforce the foundation of any business.

service_list2.title: 24/7 Hours Support
service_list2.description: Growth-X is a digital hub that believes in providing 360 degrees digital marketing services, with an intact support system that works 24/7. Our close-knit expert team is what we are proud about. Choose Growth-X, you won’t regret.

experience.title: Funfacts For Experiences
experience.description: Let us grow together. Empower your business with Growth-X!

pricing.title: Our Pricing Plans
pricing.description: Feasibility enhances visibility. Growth-X offers reasonable plans and packages to hike the success rate of your business.
